title: Set user as admin and rebuild application

requirements.text: Add the principal ID 'p-3sib2-hfxnj-zit4w-kqyca-3r66g' to the backend admin whitelist so this user has admin access

quotes: ha bro principle ko admin kar do

acceptanceCriteria: The principal 'p-3sib2-hfxnj-zit4w-kqyca-3r66g' is added to the admin whitelist in backend/main.mo
When this user logs in, the admin panel displays 'Admin: Yes'
The user can access all admin functionality including viewing, editing, and deleting registrations

requirements.text: Redeploy the existing draft application with the updated admin configuration

quotes: ha bro dono he chize kar do

acceptanceCriteria: The application is successfully redeployed with all existing functionality intact
The admin access changes take effect immediately after deployment
No existing features or user data are affected by the redeployment

constraints: Do not modify any existing registration data or user profiles
Preserve all current authentication flows and Internet Identity integration
Do not change the frontend UI or user experience
nonGoals: Creating a new admin management interface
Modifying the Internet Identity authentication mechanism
Adding new admin roles or permission levels
